meanings.definition: To indulge in excessive eating or drinking.
meanings.sent1: After the party, he was surfeiting on cake and soda.
meanings.sent2: She always ends up surfeiting on snacks while watching movies.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be surfeiting on the endless supply of treats.
meanings.sent4: His love for sweets was surfeiting, like a bottomless pit.
meanings.sent5: The buffet offered a surfeiting array of desserts.

meanings.sent1: The surfeiting of gifts overwhelmed the birthday girl.
meanings.sent2: There was a surfeiting of information in the textbook.
meanings.sent3: The surfeiting of toys in the store made it hard to choose.
meanings.sent4: The surfeiting of colors in the painting was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The surfeiting of options at the buffet left everyone satisfied.
